::: column-body
<font size= "5"> **First Year PhD Student in [Biomedical Engineering](https://www.bme.jhu.edu/) at [Johns Hopkins University](https://www.jhu.edu/)** </font>

My proficiencies lie in the domains of data analysis, machine learning, and the development and implementation of high-end computational research tools. I hope to utilize these skills and more to analyze biomedical data :)

In my spare time I love to watch and play sports, hang out with friends, and run!


## Education

**Johns Hopkins University**, Baltimore, MD

PhD in Biomedical Engineering | Aug 2023 - Month in 2028

**University of Virginia** | Charlottesville, VA

B.A in Statistics and Biology | Aug 2017 - May 2021

## Experience

**Boston Children's Hospital** | Research Assistant | Sept 2021 - June 2023
